hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TASK_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Unique Task Id generated by Spinnaker

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SVN_PROJECT_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the project within the SVN Server

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SVN_SERVER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The base URL of the SVN Server your project sources are located in

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SVN_BASE_FOLDER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The SVN base path of your project e.g. (/repo/SoftwareRealization/OP%20Papirna/op%20papirna%20-%20olsany%20-%20fg%20warehouse/trunk/Software)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NEXUS_BASE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The URL to the nexus server that hosts the desired artifacts to be deployed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEPLOYMENT_SYSTEM
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name of the folder (under 07-Deployments) that represents your target system

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: APPSERVER_DOMAIN
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name of the domain that has been chosen while executing the CreateDomain.bat the first time (e.g. opp)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: APPSERVER_DEPLOYMENT_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The deployment path within the application server where to deploy the artifacts to without leading slash! (e.g. user_projects/domains/$APPSERVER_DOMAIN/wm6DeployableFiles)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RECREATE_DOMAIN
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Shall the CreateDomain.bat be executed while deployment?

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RESTART_APPLICATION_SERVER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Shall the Applicationserver be restarted while deployment (yes is mandatory if you want the deployment to be successful)?

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EXECUTE_DATALOADER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Shall the Dataloader be created, provided and executed while deployment?

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: APPSERVER_INSTALL_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Where on the operating system of the target machine is the application server installed to? (e.g. F:\Weblogic)

hudson.plugins.descriptionsetter.Descrip.description: This script steers the deployment process
